languages.text: "За время нашего знакомства вы преподали мне множество жестоких, но важных уроков, Лорд-капитан. И я благодарна вам, правда. Вы раскрыли мне глаза на многое — жизнь не книга, не чья-то выдуманная и красочно описанная история. И пришло время мне, новатору Дома Орселлио, позаботиться о своей семье. Отношения с вами... лишь помешают мне исполнить свой долг".

traits.locale_text: "За время нашего знакомства вы преподали мне множество жестоких, но важных уроков, Лорд-капитан. И я благодарна вам, правда. Вы раскрыли мне глаза на многое — жизнь не книга, не чья-то выдуманная и красочно описанная история. И пришло время мне, новатору Дома Орселлио, позаботиться о своей семье. Отношения с вами... лишь помешают мне исполнить свой долг".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "In the time since we met, you have taught me many heartless yet valuable lessons, Lord Captain. And I am grateful to you, I truly am. You have opened my eyes to many truths. Life isn't a book, not someone's imagined and beautifully told story. And now it is time for me, the Novator of House Orsellio, to take care of my family. A relationship with you... will only distract me from performing my duty."
languages.original_text: "За время нашего знакомства вы преподали мне множество жестоких, но важных уроков, Лорд-капитан. И я благодарна вам, правда. Вы раскрыли мне глаза на многое — жизнь не книга, не чья-то выдуманная и красочно описанная история. И пришло время мне, новатору Дома Орселлио, позаботиться о своей семье. Отношения с вами... лишь помешают мне исполнить свой долг".

A relationship with you... will only distract me from doing my duty."

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、出会ってからというもの、あなたはあたくしに無慈悲ながらも価値ある教訓の数々を授けてくださいました。心から感謝しております。あたくしの目を数多の真実に開いてくださいました。人生は本ではない、誰かの想像で紡がれた美しく語られた物語ではない、と。そして今、あたくしが、オーセリオ家のノベイターが、家門を守るときです。{name}様との関係は…あたくしの義務を果たすには気を散らすものでしかありません」
languages.original_text: "In the time since we met, you have taught me many heartless yet valuable lessons, Lord Captain. And I am grateful to you, I truly am. You have opened my eyes to many truths. Life isn't a book, not someone's imagined and beautifully told story. And now it is time for me, the Novator of House Orsellio, to take care of my family. A relationship with you... will only distract me from performing my duty."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、出会ってからというもの、あなたはあたくしに無慈悲ながらも価値ある教訓の数々を授けてくださいました。心から感謝しております。あたくしの目を数多の真実に開いてくださいました。人生は本ではない、誰かの想像で紡がれた美しく語られた物語ではない、と。そして今、あたくしが、オーセリオ家のノベイターが、家門を守るときです。{name}様との関係は…あたくしの義務を果たすには気を散らすものでしかありません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “自从我们相识以来，你教会了我许多无情而又无价的教训，舰长大人。我真的很感谢你，真的。你让我明白了很多道理，你让我看到，生活并不像书里写的那样，也不是某个人想象出来的美好故事。身为奥赛罗的大族长，我是时候照顾我自己的家人了。与你之间的关系……只会让我分心，让我无法履行我的职责。”
languages.original_text: "In the time since we met, you have taught me many heartless yet valuable lessons, Lord Captain. And I am grateful to you, I truly am. You have opened my eyes to many truths. Life isn't a book, not someone's imagined and beautifully told story. And now it is time for me, the Novator of House Orsellio, to take care of my family. A relationship with you... will only distract me from performing my duty."

traits.locale_text: “自从我们相识以来，你教会了我许多无情而又无价的教训，舰长大人。我真的很感谢你，真的。你让我明白了很多道理，你让我看到，生活并不像书里写的那样，也不是某个人想象出来的美好故事。身为奥塞罗的大族长，我是时候照顾我自己的家人了。与你之间的关系……只会让我分心，让我无法履行我的职责。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Depuis notre rencontre, vous m'avez appris bon nombre de leçons aussi cruelles que précieuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et je vous en suis reconnaissante, vraiment. Vous m'avez permis d'entrevoir la vérité. La vie n'est ni un livre ni un conte de fées. Il est temps pour moi de prendre soin de ma famille, en tant que Novator de la maison Orsellio. Entretenir une relation avec vous... ne ferait que détourner mon attention. »
languages.original_text: "In the time since we met, you have taught me many heartless yet valuable lessons, Lord Captain. And I am grateful to you, I truly am. You have opened my eyes to many truths. Life isn't a book, not someone's imagined and beautifully told story. And now it is time for me, the Novator of House Orsellio, to take care of my family. A relationship with you... will only distract me from performing my duty."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis notre rencontre, vous m'avez appris bon nombre de leçons aussi cruelles que précieuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et je vous en suis reconnaissante, vraiment. Vous m'avez permis d'entrevoir la vérité. La vie n'est ni un livre ni un conte de fées. Il est temps pour moi de prendre soin de ma famille, en tant que Novator de la maison Orsellio. Entretenir une relation avec vous... ne ferait que détourner mon attention. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Desde que nos conocimos, me ha dado muchas lecciones crueles pero valiosas, Lord Capitán. Y se lo agradezco, de corazón. Me ha hecho entender un gran número de verdades. La vida no es una novela; no es una historia perfecta y preciosa. Ahora es mi turno, como Novator de la casa Orsellio, de cuidar de mi familia. Y mi relación con usted... solo puede distraerme de mi deber».
languages.original_text: "In the time since we met, you have taught me many heartless yet valuable lessons, Lord Captain. And I am grateful to you, I truly am. You have opened my eyes to many truths. Life isn't a book, not someone's imagined and beautifully told story. And now it is time for me, the Novator of House Orsellio, to take care of my family. A relationship with you... will only distract me from performing my duty."

traits.locale_text: «Desde que nos conocimos, me ha dado muchas lecciones crueles pero valiosas, Lord Capitán. Y se lo agradezco, de corazón. Me ha hecho entender un gran número de verdades. La vida no es una novela; no es una historia perfecta y preciosa. Ahora es mi turno, como Novator de la casa Orsellio, de cuidar de mi familia. Y mi relación con usted... solo puede distraerme de mi deber».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Seit wir uns begegnet sind, habt Ihr mich viele herzlose, aber wertvolle Lektionen gelehrt, Lord Captain. Und ich bin Euch dankbar, das bin ich wirklich. Ihr habt mir viele Wahrheiten gezeigt. Das Leben ist kein Buch, es ist keine ausgedachte und hübsch erzählte Geschichte. Und nun wird es Zeit, dass ich, die Novatorin des Hauses Orsellio, mich um meine Familie kümmere. Eine Beziehung mit Euch ... lenkt mich nur von meiner Pflicht ab."
languages.original_text: "In the time since we met, you have taught me many heartless yet valuable lessons, Lord Captain. And I am grateful to you, I truly am. You have opened my eyes to many truths. Life isn't a book, not someone's imagined and beautifully told story. And now it is time for me, the Novator of House Orsellio, to take care of my family. A relationship with you... will only distract me from performing my duty."

traits.locale_text: "Seit wir uns begegnet sind, habt Ihr mich viele herzlose, aber wertvolle Lektionen gelehrt, Lord Captain. Und ich bin Euch dankbar, das bin ich wirklich. Ihr habt mir viele Wahrheiten gezeigt. Das Leben ist kein Buch, es ist keine ausgedachte und hübsch verpackte Geschichte. Und nun wird es Zeit, dass ich, die Novatorin des Hauses Orsellio, mich um meine Familie kümmere. Eine Beziehung mit Euch ... lenkt mich nur von meiner Pflicht ab."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Tanıştığımız günden bu yana bana pek çok acımasız ama değerli ders verdin Lord Kaptan. Sana minnettarım. Gerçekten. Pek çok gerçeği görmemi sağladın. Hayat, kitaplardan ibaret değilmiş. Birilerinin hayal edip güzelce anlattığı bir hikâye değilmiş. Artık Orsellio Hanesi'nin Rota Reisi olarak ailemi gözetmem gerekiyor. Seninle ilişkim... Yalnızca vazifemi yapmama engel olur."
languages.original_text: "In the time since we met, you have taught me many heartless yet valuable lessons, Lord Captain. And I am grateful to you, I truly am. You have opened my eyes to many truths. Life isn't a book, not someone's imagined and beautifully told story. And now it is time for me, the Novator of House Orsellio, to take care of my family. A relationship with you... will only distract me from performing my duty."

traits.locale_text: "Tanıştığımız günden bu yana, bana pek çok acımasız ama değerli ders verdin Lord Kaptan. Sana minnettarım. Gerçekten. Pek çok gerçeği görmemi sağladın. Hayat, bir kitaptan ibaret değil: Birilerinin hayal edip güzelce anlattığı bir hikâye değil. Artık Orsellio Hanesi'nin Rota Reisi olarak ailemi gözetmem gerekiyor. Seninle bir ilişki... Sadece vazifemi yapmama engel olur."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
